body.p:
Hickman Ky Nov. 6, 1863.
Genl Jno Boyle
Adjt Genl Kenty Vols.
Sir.

On Saturday last, Oct 31st I had the honor to receive through your dept. a Commission, from His Excellency Governor Bramlette, as Lieut Col of the 40th Regt Kentucky Militia. I hereby accept the same; and herewith inclose the oath required by the Constitution and Laws of the State.
To obey all orders and see them executed, as received from my superior officers, shall be my endeavor, under all circumstances.

With great respect,
I have the honor to be
Your Obt Servt.

40th Regt
Fulton Co
Letter of accept
Let Cols. Coms.
